reviews.text: I left my phone on a train going to Rochdale and the staff at the train station were brilliant and so helpful in ensuring that I got it back. Can't thank them enough, top marks!

Good links to major towns in Lancashire and Yorkshire
 Trains are very frequent

Barrier patrol ticket checkers are very rude especially if you buy a monthly pass which stops working in the machines after 2 bloody days. In the morning especially when i am trying to get to work on time very annoying as i feel like it is a burden for them to let me through and interrupt their conversation.

Suggestion : why not have plastic re usable cards which can be topped up instead??

The ticket checkers are very rude and unprofessional. They are no help, and they have no manners in how to help or talk to a traveller. Their posture is almost like they are chilling and not working. Would not recommend this service. Horrible first experience 👎
